Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward 2
Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward 2
Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward 4
Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward 5
Chief of Police -- Town of Brusly
PW PC Prop. #1 Library -- 4.1 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Renewal - Library)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Baton Rouge, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a 4.1 mill tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,507,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of maintenance, operation and capital expenditures necessary for the West Baton Rouge Parish Library and its branches?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC Prop. #2 Drainage -- 7.2 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Renewal - Drainage)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Baton Rouge, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a 7.2 mill tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $2,646,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of maintenance, operation and capital expenditures necessary for the drainage works within and for the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC Prop. #3 Rec. Facilities -- 5 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Tax Renewal - Recreational Facilities)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Baton Rouge, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a 5 mill tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,831,252 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating and/or maintaining recreational facilities and programs in and for the Parish?
